item.title: 'Get in the Van' and Other Tips for Getting Meaningful Customer Feedback
item.description:
'Get in the Van' and Other Tips for Getting Meaningful Customer Feedback

Michael Sippey has been shipping software since that meant literally shipping software. "We used to have a field in our CRM to indicate whether the customer needed 5¼-inch floppies or 3½-inch floppies," he says. It was the early 90s - and the process and structure of product management was still being invented, often on the job.

item.title: Expensify's CEO on the Tactics that Doubled its Customer Base in Just Six Months
item.description:
Expensify's CEO on the Tactics that Doubled its Customer Base in Just Six Months

David Barrett started coding when he was six years old and hasn't stopped since. So in a way, he really has been working his whole life to found and lead Expensify , the default service for many companies to process expenses.

item.title: The Internet of Things is about to reshape e-commerce - VisionMobile
item.description:
The Internet of Things is about to reshape e-commerce - VisionMobile

E-commerce as we know it is about to be fundamentally reshaped, as every connected object in the future becomes a potential commerce channel. Internet of Things - from smart home devices to connected cars - will transform e-commerce and allow it to stretch across the breadth of the customer journey - from awareness, to intent, to purchase.
